question: Show me all data science jobs
SQL: SELECT j.title, c.company_name, j.ctc_offered FROM jobs j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id WHERE j.title LIKE '%data%' OR j.title LIKE '%analyst%'

question: Find companies in the finance industry
SQL: SELECT company_name, location FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Finance'

question: Show me applications submitted this week
SQL: SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, j.title, c.company_name FROM applications a JOIN students s ON a.student_id = s.id JOIN jobs j ON a.job_id = j.id JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id WHERE a.applied_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
